name: Cisco | IOS | Network | Port Security | Port Security Violation (SYSLOG)
description: %PORT_SECURITY-2-PSECURE_VIOLATION:Security violation occurred caused by MAC 0017.0e82.0850 on port Gi2/1.
event_class__name: Network | Port Security | Port Security Violation

patterns.value_re: %PORT_SECURITY-2-PSECURE_VIOLATION:\s*Security violation occurred,? caused by MAC( address)? (?P<mac>\S+) on port (?P<interface>\S+)\.
